metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24660 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in LemonLDAP::NG through 2.0.8, when NGINX is used. An attacker may bypass URL-based access control to protected Virtual Hosts by submitting a non-normalized URI. This also affects versions before 0.5.2 of the "Lemonldap::NG handler for Node.js" package.

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.9+ds-1').
